tool_description: Fresh company data & numbers for more than 663,425 companies in 🇩🇪 Germany: Address, email, capital, people & more.
name: German Companies API
title: German Companies API

api_list.name: search
api_list.description:
Search companies based on company name and location.

Returns the number of matches, along with a list of companies. 
Results from this endpoint contain only company name, company ID and a list of data available for this company. The actual data can then be accessed using the `/details` endpoint.

The result list is paginated to 25 items per page, and you can request any page.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://german-companies-api.p.rapidapi.com/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "german-companies-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: details
api_list.description: Fetch all available data for the given company, identified by its `company_id`.
